description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. You and your friends create worlds in BlockWorld. With the best graphics, largest worlds and most items you can do anything you want.  Unlock new blocks and items with Awards in uniquely generated worlds during the day and night in BlockWorld.  Swords, Arrows, bombs and Guns let you challenge your friends to combat and destruction in BlockWorld. Version v2.1 Join us at BlockWorldGame.com !
